titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 601 East 12th Street in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Richard Bolling Federal Building".

An Act to designate the Federal building located at 601 East 12th Street in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Richard Bolling Federal Building and the United States Courthouse" located at Ninth and Locust Streets, in Kansas City, Missouri, as the "Charles Evans Whittaker United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-230.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

action.text: Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works incorporated provisions of related measures S. 1712 in reported measure.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus with an amendment and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 357.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Traficant moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/24/1994--Passed Senate amended. Designates the Federal building at 601 East 12th Street, Kansas City, Missouri, as the Richard Bolling Federal Building; and (2) the United States Courthouse located at Ninth and Locust Street in such city as the Charles Evans Whittaker United States Courthouses.
